greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of 1/(1 + x*Product_{k>=1} (1 + x^k)).
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
mathematica: nmax = 75; CoefficientList[Series[1/(1 + x Product[(1 + x^k), {k, 1, nmax}]), {x, 0, nmax}], x]
a[0] = 1; a[n_] := a[n] = -Sum[PartitionsQ[k - 1] a[n - k], {k, 1, n}]; Table[a[n], {n, 0, 75}]
results.author: _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Aug 29 2018
